name: OSLogEntry.StoreCategory
desc: A classification of how the entry was to be stored and rotated at the point when it was created.

items.name: case metadata
items.desc: This entry was generated as information about the other entries or about the sequence of entries as a whole.

items.name: case shortTerm
items.desc: This entry was not intended to be long-lived, and was captured in the ring buffer.

items.name: case longTermAuto
items.desc: The entry was tagged with a hint indicating the system should try to preserve it based on the amount of space available.

items.name: case longTerm1
items.desc: The entry was tagged with a hint indicating the system should try to preserve it for approximately 1 day.

items.name: case longTerm3
items.desc: The entry was tagged with a hint indicating the system should try to preserve it for approximately 3 days.

items.name: case longTerm7
items.desc: The entry was tagged with a hint indicating the system should try to preserve it for approximately 7 days.

items.name: case longTerm14
items.desc: The entry was tagged with a hint indicating the system should try to preserve it for approximately 14 days.

items.name: case longTerm30
items.desc: The entry was tagged with a hint indicating the system should try to preserve it for approximately 30 days.
